name: The 31st Piece Overturns the Board
author: Mojji Wang &#40왕모찌&#41
content: Ever since Kang Seol was a child, he&#039s had strange dreams where he and several people wear masks while playing &quotWorld of Eternity,&quot a board game full of quests and adventures. And although Seol was great at the game, he was never able to win. But now, his dreams have become reality, and humans have become game pieces!Humanity&#039s only hope is for Seol to recall what he did in his dreams to survive. Even though he&#039s never won, will he be able to turn the tables and finally make
